name: THAT GAME
description:
Find THAT GAME.

The GAMES are OUT TO GET YA !

Carlos works in a board game shop and the new sensation ''THAT GAME'' just came out ! Everybody wants one.

The toys in the back-store aren't so happy about that and will stop at nothing to prevent Carlos from getting those darn boxes.

---

Étienne Bourdages

Frédérik Généreux

Daphnée Péloquin

Laurence Sansregret

Francis Tremblay

---

Made in the context of FUNNI JAM 2 with the theme : The game is your enemy.

It was made in the course of 3 days.

Made in Montréal & Chicoutimi, Québec, Canada :)
